alert.note: Alert for Perry; Ste. Genevieve (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 11:13AM CDT until further notice by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois... Mississippi River at Louisiana. Mississippi River at Chester. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois... Mississippi River at Clarksville. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Chester. * WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 34.7 feet, The north parking lot at Menard Correctional Center begins flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 26.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 34.2 feet early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg 1 pm Fri Sat Sun Mon Tue Mississippi River Chester 27.0 26.4 28.4 31.3 33.3 34.2 34.0 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Rainfall heavier than forecast could cause river levels to rise even higher than predicted. The National Weather Service will monitor this developing situation and issue follow up statements as conditions change. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
